agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Land & Resource Management TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, March 5, 2019 PLACE: E2.012 CHAIR: Rep. Tom Craddick The Committee will hear invited testimony from The General Land Office and the City of San Antonio. The Committee will also hear public testimony on the following bills: HB 347 King, Phil | et al. Relating to eliminating distinctions in the application of consent annexation requirements. HB 515 Bailes Relating to the establishment and operation of certain private family cemeteries. HB 795 Patterson Relating to a municipality's ability to enforce zoning and other land use regulations against electric companies. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
